problem_text: Find D C if D G and J M are altitudes and \triangle K J L \sim \triangle E D C.
compact_text: Find DC if DG and JM are altitudes and \triangle KJL \sim \triangle EDC.
annotat_text: Find $D C$ if $\overline{D G}$ and $\overline{J M}$ are altitudes and $\triangle K J L \sim \triangle E D C$
